summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers." The text indicates a requirement for respectful scraping practices, specifically mandating the use of robots.txt and addressing rate limiting. It directs scrapers to utilize the Government Publishing Office's (GPO) bulk data download service (fdsys/bulkdata) as an alternative. The bill focuses on responsible data access and potentially penalizes those who disregard these guidelines.
